item.title: Native Instruments: Summer of Sound Sale (50% off)
item.description: Native Instruments’ Summer of Sound is back. Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of Expansions 50% off KOMPLETE 14 upgrades 50% off TRAKTOR PRO 3 updates 50% off instrument & effect upgrades 50% off iZotope All offers end July 6th.
item.content:encoded:
Native Instruments’ Summer of Sound is back. Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of Expansions

  • 50% off KOMPLETE 14 upgrades
  • 50% off TRAKTOR PRO 3 updates
  • 50% off instrument & effect upgrades
  • 50% off iZotope

All offers end July 6th.
